name: Skincare Shelf
short_description: AI-powered app for personalized skincare analysis and product recommendations
description: Developed a web-based skincare recommendation platform leveraging AI to analyze product ingredients and provide personalized suggestions. Built using Next.js, Python, and FastAPI, with a scalable database of skincare products and user-generated ratings to enhance discoverability and improve user skin health outcomes.

name: AI Music Generator
short_description: Full-stack platform for real-time AI-powered music generation
description: Led a team of 6 to create a full-stack platform integrating 4 AI models for dynamic, real-time music generation. Architected scalable infrastructure using Next.js, Flask, and MongoDB, and deployed the application on Heroku. Designed efficient database structures to optimize data storage and retrieval operations.

name: Avatar Dealer
short_description: Unreal Engine 5 project enhancing avatar interactions using AI
description: Enhanced in-game avatar responses with Large Language Models and Generative AI in Unreal Engine 5. Integrated TTS and STT models for lifelike interactions, contributing to seamless gameplay. Improved real-time rendering with NVIDIA Omniverse, reducing latency for audio lip-sync animations.

name: Mobile Loyalty App
short_description: Proof-of-concept loyalty app with NFC and mobile wallet integration
description: Developed a proof-of-concept loyalty app using Angular for NFC communication with gambling machines. Automated mobile wallet pass generation with Python scripts for seamless integration into the loyalty app, streamlining user rewards management.
